name: Storm Vulcan
description:
This is an early prototype of Storm Vulcan, a shoot 'em up made for newbies and hardcore fans alike.

I recommend downloading it, as the HTML version is still not optimized.

Controls:

Z/A - Auto-fire

X/B - Thunder Laser

Shift/L1 - Slowdown

Controllers are supported. No remapping yet, maybe soon(ish).

3 Difficulty modes.
